adminProgramAdd.displayNonFullSupply.des: Enable the non-full supply tab for this program's requisition form
adminProgramAdd.allowSkippingPeriods.des: Enable Skipping Periods for this program's requisition form
adminProgramAdd.skipAuthorization.label: Skip Authorization Step

adminProgramAdd.enableDatePhysicalStockC: Enable field for Date Physical Stock Count Completed
Require users to enter this date when a requisition is Submitted; the date can be edited when a requisition is Authorized.
